parallel

Class UnboundedBufferArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • parallel.UnboundedBufferArray
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BufferIntf

    public class UnboundedBufferArray
extends java.lang.Object
implements BufferIntf
    a FIFO buffer implemented as a (resizable) Object Array. It's meant to be used as a (faster) replacement for Vector structures in UnboundedXXXMsgPassingCoordinator family of classes.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2015-2020

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

      • addElement

        public void addElement(java.lang.Object obj)
        add an object in the buffer. If there is no space left, double the size and copy the elements to the new buffer, then add element.
        Specified by:
